title: Calling for Expressions of Interest to set apart the old Bogambara Prison Land located in Kandy, on 50 year lease basis
decision_details: - The old Bogambara Prison land, which has been vested with the Urban Development Authority, is located within the Utility Service Zone of the Kandy Municipal Council Area Development Plan, which has been prepared for the Kandy Municipal Council area covering the period 2021-2030. The Bogambara Prison Premises and prison buildings have been identified under the World Heritage Building Conservation, and there is a potential to carry out cultural and tourism promotion activities in those premises. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Urban Development, Construction and Housing to call for investment proposals for the disposal of the relevant land on a 50-year lease basis, in order to implement a development project with financial, environmental and social potential in accordance with the preliminary plan of the Urban Development Authority, was approved by the Cabinet.
